name: Tower
description: a story about two (girl) friends on a grey, vertical tower.

name: Tour de France 2023
description: Ride shoulder to shoulder with the best cyclists and show your panache to triumph on the Champs-Elysées in the official video game of the Tour de France 2023! Compete in mountain or flat stages and experience all the action of the Grande Boucle.

name: Tiebreak
description: The official ATP and WTA Tennis game has finally arrived! Become the Number One player in the world, competing for entire seasons against the largest cast of professional tennis players ever united in a tennis videogame.

name: Pro Cycling Manager 2023
description: Manage a team of professional cyclists: control the budget, recruit young talent, train riders and devise race strategies. Jostle for position to reach the top of the world rankings!

name: Rugby 25
description: Welcome to the ultimate rugby gaming experience, Rugby 25! Whether you're a passionate fan or a newcomer to the world of rugby, Rugby 25 immerses you in the heart of the action and hard-hitting tackles like no rugby video game has before. From humble local club matches to the bright lights of the world's greatest international tournaments, every detail has been meticulously crafted to bring the excitement and intensity of the sport to your fingertips. Rugby 25: where legends are born, and history is made.

name: R-Gear
description:
A cancelled follow-up to Taito's 1994 shooting game Rayforce that was shelved in favour of development of Raystorm - a single stage prototype for the game was made but was formerly unreleased bar for some screenshots and videoclips.

As part of the Ray'z Arcade Chronology the prototype build consisting of a single stage was released as a bonus standalone game, featuring new music from series composer Tamayo Kawamoto.

name: Lustless
description: James, a lonely man, begins his journey of seeking a job after his recent transition to Mediyork City. After it doesn't go to plan, he changes his goal from getting a job, to getting himself a partner by the end of the night.

name: Wipeout Pure: Gamma Pack
description: Released in three parts, this pack features four new tracks around Makana, two teams from Wipeout Fusion, Tigron and Van-Über, and four UI skins themed around four of the standard teams (FEISAR, Auricom, Qirex, and Piranha).

name: Wipeout Pure: Delta Pack
description: Released in two parts, this pack features four new tracks set in a central entertainment hub and four UI skins themed around four of the standard teams (AG Systems, Assegai, Triakis, and Harimau). The European version also includes two PUMA-branded ships.

name: Wipeout Pure: Classic Pack
description: Being a four-part release for Japan, three for the US, and two for Europe (with the parts further spilt between content and music), this pack expands on the four classic tracks that came with the game, based on one of the tracks from each of the previous games. Goteki 45 and Icaras return to complete the Wipeout 3 lineup. This pack also includes four UI skins themed around the four DLC teams (Tigron, Van-Über, Goteki 45, and Icaras).

name: Nuggie House: Cerberus
description: Choose a realm of terror; the childish yet vibrant world of Snoocoland, the mundane halls of a high school, or the grand imagining of a wishful mind's dream mansion. Step carefully though, they might hear you.

name: Viaja Baraja
description: Viaja Baraja is a Spanish-language visual novel where you play cards that represent your attitude and emotional state to have conversations with your friends and peers. Just out of high-school, Daira and her friends embark on a journey of self-discovery.

name: Estresamente
description: A metroidvania inside the human body, where you play as a little guy dealing with the stress of the teenager whose body comprises the entire game world.

name: Los Rostros del Bosque
description: A metroidvania where you draw constellations on the screen to put on animal masks that unlock different abilities, set in a magical Latin American forest.

name: Gambari Minoriko: Onee-chan no Shiren
description:
Action RPG starring the character "Minoriko Aki" from Touhou Project.
The game was produced using TonyuSystem2.

name: Yondu's Journey
description: Join legendary warrior Yondu in this interactive fmv adventure as he battles for survival in hostile territory. With his cunning, strength, and unwavering spirit, Yondu rises above adversity in this epic tale of survival and adventure. Get ready for an unforgettable journey with Yondu the Fearless!

name: Wizard of Wyndmoor
description: Wizard of Wyndmoor is a wizard survival game for Windows, Mac and Linux

name: Walstikski
description: Do you think you can beat Walstikski, well i dont. Walstikski is currently a single player game that brings you through parkour leves that are near impossible to beat. Walstikski has a funny design that you will be seeing throughout the levels. Multiplayer and Story Mode coming soon.

name: Vona: She
description: Perform an Ukrainian housewife's life attempting to breaking the daily life loop

name: Uncle Kenny: The Game
description: Run, jump and shoot! Uncle Kenny has been lured into an abandoned park trail by a mysterious old friend. Fight to survive! 2D platformer with shoot 'em up action and an arcadey feel. A passion project by the developer, ACT 1 is available today!

name: Torico's Mine Quest!
description: Clean up the mine and uncover its secrets in this game inspired by classic 90s platformers!

name: Tide Girl: Phenomena
description: Enjoy the murder by the word.

name: The Legend of Lorosity
description: A traditional turn-based rpg following a story-driven plot with vibrant characters, and unique animations combined with fast and explosive gameplay!

name: Rise of the Funkys
description: A side scrolling beat 'em up game where you control 4 characters with unique combat mechanics. Make your way through 6 stages of this crime-ridden world, where random events happen to spice up the combat experience.

name: Retro Short Game
description: Retro Short Game is a simple, 2D, multiplayer roguelike with content for both new and experienced players to enjoy: featuring three distinct weapons to learn and master, a variety of upgrades for the player to mix and match, and enemies with a myriad of attack patterns.

name: Shiner
description: Learn every attack that gets used against you in this turn-based strategy game. Meet (and battle) a colorful cast of fully voice-acted characters as you search for the bully who wronged you.

name: Skip
description: Skip, hop, jump!

name: Slide Puzzle: Cute Moe Girls
description: Cute girl slide puzzle

name: The Cure
description: The Cure is a hardcore 3D shooter with surviving elements where you must survive in zombie apocalypse.

name: The Hero Journey in Yggdrasil
description: Meet the Fjernis wolf, The Norns, the chattering squirrel Ratatosk, the eagle Hräsvelg. In hero's journey, you leave the known world for an adventure, then return with new knowledge, insight and power! Climb Yggdrasil, fight the dragon, save the environment, ride the rainbow! Go from zero to hero

name: Sunny-Place-3: Microgods
description: Welcome to the plains of eternal dissent, fight honourable wars in this micro focused action RTS. Compete against other players in 1v1 skirmishes on the tracks towards Glory.

name: In Ukrainian Soil
description: Soar through the transcendental realm and guide lost souls to heaven's gates in this rhythm-fueled psychodelic racing game.

name: Madgun
description: Madgun - fast-paced, old-school first-person shooter with 90s graphics where you need to score the most points by killing monsters. Destroy all enemies and complete a special mission.

name: Meta Lines
description: When you feel bored, tired and dazzled by the cool game pictures, it's better to play a relaxed, intellectual and simple leisure game Meta Lines, which is suitable for playing while waiting in line for another game. Wish you have a good time !

name: Medved Hellraiser
description: Fun 3D first-person shooter, with humorous funny bosses, sounds and dialogues.

name: Neko Hentai Girl: Beach Match-3
description: Only in our game you get a beautiful Match-3 with naked girls, cute animals, various locations, arousing female moans, fine design, relaxing music, cheat and 100 achievements.

name: Pack Man in Rio
description: Make a living as a packman assistant in this game that teaches how to handle money while you enjoy a beach, surf, Altinho matches, and even a human pac-man between good and bad guys! Welcome to Rio, this nice City of God! Keep your wallet and cell phone inside your pocket, if you can... xD

name: Physical Layer
description: Physical Layer is a stylish, top-down shooter with cute, gun-toting characters. Utilize three powerful abilities to overcome a total of 240 stages, filled with a variety of enemies and challenges.

name: Future Front
description: is a strategy, card, collection, battle, and nurturing piece with a girl theme. Develop your characters, strengthen your equipment, and build a top team that belongs only to you. hundreds of skills, free combination, Easy to place, as the strongest commander, to explore the world of hanging journey!

name: Genie
description: Explore fantastic environments as Lula, as she journeys to discover the meaning of the Genie and fulfill her destiny.

name: Genesis of a Small God
description: You have awoken as a small god. As you accumulate the faith and souls of your followers, you will learn incredible new abilities. Protect, guide your people and smite any threats that may arise. The fate of your world is in your hands.

name: Girls Love Toys
description: Girls Love Toys - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Heavy Armored Assassin
description: A military-themed stand-alone 3D simulation shooting game, drive vehicles through the enemy's rear, and at the same time command your two-vehicle formation, break through the enemy's defense line, search and destroy the intruder command post.

name: Hellcome
description: Hellcome is a Multiplayer Roguelite Shooter designed for 1-4 players who want challenging experiences. Play with various characters, team up with your friends and unlock new abilities to stay alive. But watch out; it features no auto-aim, so get ready for true test of your skill and reflexes.

name: Hentai Oni
description: Hentai Oni is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of oni and 24 unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: House Sitter Escape Game
description: "House Sitter Escape Game" is an escape game in Virtual Reality (VR) and PC (non-VR). Enter the house of the family 02500L3 and enjoy the peace, while it last.

name: GunSuit Guardians
description: Gear up your GunSuit and defend Earth from an alien siege! Equip and upgrade unique arsenals of overpowered weapons to survive overwhelming numbers in this action-roguelite twin-stick horde survival.

name: I Commissioned Some Dogs
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many dogs and bones as they could inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 15 art pieces to choose from, and 1500+ hidden objects, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Cum on Bus
description: Cum On Bus 3D is a mind control simulator. You will be unlocking new sex scenes by controlling the character meet her highest mood and reward you by her body.

name: Cyber Mission
description: Side-scroller, with beautiful 2D pixel art, addictive shooter gameplay, classic levels and weapons that will let you perform a symphony of destruction of the alien base in the black eye galaxy.

name: Dark Desire Mute 3
description: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.

name: Dimensionless
description: Dive into this platformer taking up the classics of the genre, bringing its unique touch where you will have to change color between black and white and vice versa to move forward!

name: Dirty Vampires: An RPG Tower Defence Adventure
description: A Tower Defence RPG. Defend waves of enemies. Balance your strategy between economy and fighters. Earn gold in battle to upgrade your towers permanently. Earn XP to unlock hero perks. Shop in the town market to purchase powerful trinkets that change the way your fight.

name: Film Studio Manager
description: Film Studio Manager is an interactive business simulation game where you manage your own film studio. You need to be creative, strategic and have an eye for success to succeed in the game's business.

name: Aquaphobia
description: Aquaphobia is a first-person poetic artwork by Jakob Kudsk Steensen. It connects inner psychological landscapes to exterior ecosystems. Told in parallel to a break-up story, each environment explores a stage of treatment for aquaphobia, within the wider context of global rising water levels.

name: Amazing Trip to Europe
description: Search and Find hidden items while traveling across Europe!

name: 1414: Crossroads
description: An RPG adventure, based on old-school, retro 2D games.

name: Aw Heck, War!
description: A Single-Player Indie VR shooter sandbox war game

name: As Talk as Walk Wayfarer Team: Land of Music
description: A adventure game. Wayfarer Team, received the princess of the Land of Music invitation, set foot on an unknown adventure.

name: Barnstormers: Determined to Win
description: Travel back in time to the era of Negro League Baseball. This immersive experience sets you in the 1940's where legends of the game were making a name for themselves in spite of the oppositions set against them. Experience the story first hand as a player during this pivotal time in history.

name: Build and Drive Racing
description: Get ready for a new experience on Windows desktop and VR, where you get to build your ultimate racing machine, tailored to your driving style and optimized for performance, or race to the finish line with a monster what makes you smile.

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Upside Town
description: It's a beautiful day in Upside Town—which means putting through the most topsy turvy mini golf course the world has never known! A physics-defying system of gravity fields permeates the neighborhood, so do your stretches and take an umbrella because you just never know which way things will roll.

name: Two Point Campus: School Spirits
description: Tackle a paranormal pest problem, learn what it means to be dead, and help those looking for a new lease on the afterlife.

name: Train Sim World 3: Linke Rheinstrecke - Mainz: Koblenz Route
description: Wind the clock back to the 1990s and experience the flagship of the Deutsche Bundesbahn; be enveloped by stunning Rheinland countryside, from the shimmering river to castle-topped hills, and serve historical towns in style with Train Sim World 3: Linke Rheinstrecke: Mainz - Koblenz!

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Biatatá: Still Waters Run Deep
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary consumable: Biatatá (Hunter), Cobra da Várzea (Scottfield Model 3 Spitfire), Proteção do Andarilho (Winfield 1893 Slate), and Língua de Fogo (Liquid Fire Bomb).

name: Let's Play! Oink Games: Nine Tiles
description: In only 10 seconds to explain the rules, everyone can have fun. Kids and adults!

name: Puzzle Together: Animals Jigsaw Super Pack
description: Unlock 277 puzzles depicting wild, lovable, and crazy animals! Relax making these puzzles on your own or with friends. In addition to unlocking 277 unique puzzles (a $34.97 value if purchased in-game), this Super Pack also comes with 5 puzzle credits so you can unlock some more of your choosing.

name: Puzzle Together: Architecture Jigsaw Super Pack
description: Unlock 185 puzzles depicting buildings and landmarks! Relax making these puzzles on your own or with friends and family. In addition to unlocking 185 unique puzzles (a $32.97 value if purchased in-game), this Super Pack also comes with 5 puzzle credits so you can unlock some more of your choosing.

name: Puzzle Together: Great Paintings Jigsaw Super Pack
description: Unlock 508 puzzles depicting great paintings! Relax making these puzzles on your own or with friends and family. In addition to unlocking 508 unique puzzles (a $76.94 value if purchased in-game), this Super Pack also comes with 5 puzzle credits so you can unlock some more of your choosing.

name: Romancelvania: Deluxe Edition
description: Bite into Romancelvania, a darkly comic genre mashup, combining side-scrolling action and tongue-in-cheek romance into one completely absurd and unforgettable adventure. Launching March 7!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: St. Patrick's Paradise
description: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! St. Patrick's Day themed table with a controllable cannon!

name: Sker Ritual: Siren's Song
description: Captured and imprisoned on Sker Island years before, the Siren's Song can be heard for miles, entrancing all who listens, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!

name: Sker Ritual: Stranger Danger
description: Plague Sker Island and hypnotise all its residents with The Stranger, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!

name: Coloring Pixels: Japan Pack
description: This Japan-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! All images are of Japanese icons or Japanese culture!

name: Dead by Daylight: Tools of Torment Chapter
description: The Tools Of Torment Chapter features a new Killer - The Skull Merchant - and two new Survivors, Thalita and Renato Lyra. Purchasing this add-on unlocks 3 exclusive Cosmetics: The Skull Merchant's Slipshod Prototype, Thalita's Golden Ambition, and Renato's Golden Touch.

name: Escort Alia: Escort Rena
description: A short FPS game. The game is a free add-on for the base game.

name: Doraemon Story of Seasons: Friends of the Great Kingdom - Together with Animals
description: Bring home an animal themed pack with a stable full of outfits, furniture, and a mini-story.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 9
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 11
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 10
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Beat!: After the Summer - Another Season Episode
description: This is a story about 4 girls, who had a desire to become an idol. After the break-up of ♡beAt, they are facing a new challenge and about to stand out.

name: Space Tail: Every Journey Leads Home - Ultimate Edition
description: Space Tail is a 2.5D adventure platformer, which immerses the player in a deep, emotional plot, and lets him explore new planets and interact with alien civilizations.

Tap the buttons to place numbers on them so that they sum up to 5. The numbers can sum up to 5 along the row, column or diagonally.
Numbers get cleared up when they add to 5 so that more numbers can be placed. When none of the rows/columns/diagonals add to 5 and the 9x9 cells fill up, the game is over. The game supports two modes - infinite and timed mode. Friends can challenge each other for high scores in timed mode.

name: Word Wreck
description:
Word Wreck is a fast-paced word game. The letters just keep falling and you have to make a word out of them before they fill your screen! If you're not quick enough the letters will turn into stone and you can't use them anymore!
Some letters have bombs which will clear a nice chunk of the board. If that's not enough, collect gold coins and buy some help! You can destroy the bottom row, freeze time or increase the lives of every tile on the board.

name: Word Chef: Letter Pop
description:
Slide your finger over the bubbles to find words in this new word scramble game!
Turn your words into wild soup flavors and share them with your friends -- make them smile, laugh or gross them out, it's up to you!

name: Spy Game: Mission in Moskow
description: Infinite episodes Moscow streets, Kremlin and other. The player collects USB sticks and laptops containing sensitive information while being chased by Agent Jake, whose mission is to arrest you. If the player is caught, he ends up in prison Bay and the game ends. Your purpose is to find USSR hydrogen bomb which is dropped onto the map when "Uncle Plutin" is called on a cellphone, effectively ridding it from obstacles.

name: Demonologist
description: Demonologist is a Co-Op horror game that can be played with a maximum of 4 people and at least 1 person. Your goal is to detect the evil spirit type in cursed places with your team or alone by using your equipment, and exorcise the entity.

name: Sprinkfield
description:
Help Walter Sprinkfield water all his fields in this brand new logic puzzle.
Sprinkfield is a challenging and entirely unique game for iPhone and iPad.
Don’t falter, just water and help Walter!

name: Soccer Lines
description: Soccer Lines is a super addictive, simple, yet challenging puzzle game. Remove soccer themed pieces from the board by lining up five pieces of the same colour in a vertical, horizontal or diagonal direction. Testing wits and reflexes, more pieces are added after every move, forcing you to think ahead to stop the board from filling up. Use special power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

name: RingoWord
description: Playing is easy: Quickly figure out where the word starts within the circle. Sounds simple, but trying to spot the right word is a real challenge. Compete against the clock and your online opponents. Can you reach the top and become #1 in the World? Get ready for a real brain training!

name: Hidden Words!
description: Word game such as Hidden Words is not just for fun, but a great way of exercising your Brain. Expand your vocabulary and spelling Skills with Hidden Words.

name: Lucky 21
description: Drag 3-9 blocks onto the board, total 21 in any row or column, score points for your games! and play to your heart's content!

name: Party Doodles
description: Party Doodles is the ultimate party drawing and guessing game.

name: Quiz Express
description: English grammar is the way in which meanings are encoded into wordings in the English language. This includes the structure of words, phrases, clauses, and sentences, right up to the structure of whole texts. It is important to speak and write grammatically correct English that is universally understood. The motivation behind this quiz app is for you to practice your English grammar regularly while on the go. We believe you can learn better by practicing rather than just studying grammar rules. The quiz is designed such that each session takes no more than a minute to complete thus you can easily find time to play it even while commuting.

name: Reveal that Word!
description: Reveal the picture square by square and guess what the object is!

name: Hold a Second
description: Put your concentration skills and reflexes to proof! Are you precise enough with time?

name: Highrise Heroes
description: The towering word-game that fits in your pocket! Following a sudden earthquake, Seb must escape a crumbling skyscaper. Along the way he will make some intriguing new friends, and together they might just unravel the sinister origins of the 'quake, assuming they can evade the mysterious stalker in close pursuit...

name: Happy Shape Blast
description:
Just simple old school swap and match, with colorful funny shapes. There are almost 1000 big landscape mode levels. Some are challenging, some are easier, but all are fun and playable by young and old!
Match the colorful blocks, balls, triangles and more shapes by swapping them and lining up 3 or more. Create bombs and boosters by matching more to help win the levels before time runs out!

name: Enigma
description: Enigma is a word guessing game like hang man. Except guessing with letters, you need to guess with words. Green means that a letter is in the right spot. Yellow means that a letter is in the word, but not in the right position.

name: Escape Room: Christmas Quest
description:
Addictive Escape room - Christmas Quest!, find the clues and collect objects to solve puzzles!
This Christmas party room escape story is full of secrets and riddles. A new free game, Find keys to unlock all doors. You will be pleasantly surprised by the variety of levels with brainstorming puzzles.So now she needs to make a real detective investigation, solve puzzles, seek and find solutions to the difficult situations so that you can be in time for escape from Christmas party house.

name: Dual Spin
description: Do you have the skills to master a simple gem puzzles game that can be really demanding? In our Dual Spin Game we require to arrange the gems in correct order. It looks easy, but it is definitely hard to master. If you love thinking challenges, try Dual Spin, you will not be disappointed.

name: Cumulater
description:
Run to the rocket by building up the blocks!
It is a simple but little bit difficult puzzle action game!
There are 80 stages in all. Let's compete for a high score!

name: Crazy Seahorses
description:
Soak up the tropical atmosphere in Crazy Seahorses - addictive, action-packed fun in a living, breathing cartoon!
Featuring colourful, funny characters and some freaky fish, race to save the cute sea unicorn from the mischievous sea monkey pirates! Embark on a chaotic chase to catch the monkey pirate ship. Smash, crash and dash through coconut shacks and jump over obstacles as the seahorses open lucky treasure chests and gain super powers inflating them into bouncy balloons, and a jetpack to catch-up with those dastardly monkeys!

name: CandyMouse
description: With the progress of the times, more and more funny games enter into our life, but I want to ask a question, do you still remember Tom & Jerry on the black and white TV in the old times?

name: Bring Me Down
description: Balance the platform, collect bananas while avoiding rockets and mines, compete with your friends on Game Center, all in this fresh new arcade game.

name: Critter Combat
description: Sin descripción

name: Chain Reaction Classic
description:
Objective of the game is to Eliminate all of the Opponent's Atoms by Strategically Exploding your Atom and Owing neighbor cells.
A player may only put an atom in an empty cell or a cell having an atom of its own Color. When the cell reaches threshold,The Atom Explodes and move to neighbour cells.

name: 66 Bricks
description:
Give you 66 bricks, build your own tower.
Physical version of Tetris, be arbitrary place bricks, build a variety of towers, challenge the patience and balance limits, see how high you can stack.
How to play: Move your finger left and right to adjust the position of the bricks, move your finger down brick drop quickly , tap the screen rotate bricks.

name: Active Color
description: From the makers of Jewel Frenzy comes Active Color, a cool, colorful, and explosively addictive puzzle game that will keep you entertained for hours.

name: Arcade Video Games Quiz
description:
Get a handful of quarters, prepare yourself to take a trip back to the most amazing arcade parlor ever and accept our challenge:
How many Arcade Video Games can you name?
Find it out in the most comprehensive Arcade Gaming trivia game ever!
Write the name of the pictured arcade classic to clear a level. Do it as fast as you can and earn high scores and Video Game Quiz coins!

name: Animal School 1st Grade Games
description:
Help your animal friends through 100 challenges across 40+ first grade levels in this all new adventure across the African wild!
Playable by kids of all ages with lots of positive encouragement, professional narration and catchy music. Cute characters include giraffes, meerkats, lions, hippos, zebras, warthogs, cheetahs and rhinos!
Designed by parents and teachers, this app adheres to Common Core Standards for first grade math, science and more.

name: Transport Fever 2: Console Edition - Deluxe Edition
description: The classic transport simulation genre has a new gold standard with Transport Fever 2. Provide the world with the transport infrastructure it needs and make a fortune with custom-made transport services. Discover a whole new world by navigating transport routes through land, water and air. May progress and prosperity find their way!

name: Tiny Troopers: Global Ops - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Attention! Tiny Troopers: Global Ops is a fast-paced arcade twin-stick shooter in which you lead an elite squad of Tiny Troopers on action-packed missions to take down hordes of unscrupulous enemies from all corners of the world!

name: Transport Fever 2: Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition includes 3 exclusive scenarios across all landscape types to challenge your skills, 6 new and exclusive historical vehicles to play with, 3 surprising new animals for the three landscape types and 2 new in-game soundtracks.

name: The Librarian: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Escort Alia
description: Simple TPS. Escort your companion, Alia, to destination. It's a 3D version of the classic 2D maze. Alia thinks for herself and responds to enemies and follows the player.

name: Otosan
description:
An Earthbound-inspired RPG adventure by William Kage, the creator of Fragrant Story.

Being released digitally as “the world's first 10-second 3DS game”, Otosan: Nintendo 3DS Edition launches on March 2023, the same month Nintendo’s eShop service is being discontinued, as a bite-sized microgame which will further be updated into the full product.

name: Shadow BoXR
description: Shadow BoXR is a rhythm boxing game intended to make working out fun. Punch the targets and dodge the obstacles all while rocking out to your favorite music. This is your workout built by you for you.

name: I Need Space
description: Travel across the universe with your nebulous companion the Cosmicat, together revitalizing planets and discovering the cosmic truth of the universe.

name: Showtime: Vampire Diaries
description: Are you a good interviewer? You have the most intriguing guest ever, a vampire, but be careful with the question! He's a pretty irascible guest.

name: Bitter-Sweet Cohabitation
description: The hero is looking for someone to be by his side, and the heroines are looking for a place to stay. Their circumstances become clear, but what will he choose…?

name: Happy Mouse
description: Sin descripción

name: Lovers in Playa Rosa
description: “Lovers in Playa Rosa” is a Romantic Comedy Visual Novel and Yuri Dating Sim where you play as barkeeper Tina Lee as she takes a trip to Mexico to improve her fortunes and explore lesbian love!

name: Friday Night Funkin' VS Ralsei
description: Have you ever wanted to sing against a fluffy boy? Well, now's your chance!

name: Captain Wayne: Vacation Desperation
description: Captain Wayne is an intense, fast-action Retro Shooter about a sailor with a Shotgun for an arm!! With a cartoony, hand-drawn art style and gory gameplay, you'll have to mow down enemies through 8 action-packed levels to take back what's yours.

name: Twell
description: This adventure is about you waking up in this world named Twell. The only thing you can do is explore what this world has to offer. Explore 8 unique dungeons, discover many secrets and visit many locations.

name: Otokiyome
description: A bizarre horror adventure based on the original idea of VTuber "Shirakawa Yuri". Explore a village in the middle of the night and place a PC in a designated spot to purify the sound. A monster appears and attacks to destroy the PC, so escape while protecting the PC.

name: The Viriditas Chapel of Perpetual Adoration
description: Contemplate the beauty of creation and the love of God kneeling at a virtual altar inspired by Hildegard von Bingen.

name: Ghost Hunter
description: Ghost Hunter - is the simplest 3D shooter with horror elements where you will have to fight with different ghosts!

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Adventure Sonic
description:
Features:
- Easy to digest physics and moveset taking the best from Sonic Adventure 1 and 2!
- Outstanding support for controllers and simple mode. Give it a try on SA-Sonic and be surprised! (NOTE: Bind "Center Camera" to a comfortable button, you might prefer it over manual camera turning!)
- A fleshed out super form, custom NiGHTS moveset, many easter eggs, and deep-rooted mechanics hardcore fans will instantly recognize!
- A custom Adventure menu for cosmetical and accessibility options!
After around a year of work, Adventure Sonic (AKA SA-Sonic!) is complete! SA-Sonic heavily alters the game's physics to resemble Adventure 1 and 2's, whilst scaling everything to still feel good within an SRB2 context.

Sonic has more turning control and air resistance like in Adventure, and much stronger interactions with slopes! SRB2 normally encourages you to stay airborne to keep your speed and zoom over obstacles, but SA Sonic is instead at his fastest on the ground!

Adventure Sonic supports all control styles! (strafe, standard, & simple) Normally SRB2 prioritizes keyboard+mouse, with controllers being a massive self-induced handicap. But SA-Sonic was designed with a controller-play in mind, as that's what comes to mind for us when we think "3D Sonic platformer". The primary goal was to make Adventure Sonic control naturally for both casual players and SRB2 physics loyalists both. Here's hoping we achieved that goal!

name: Escape Chronicles
description: Welcome to ORP Eagle, an immersive educational and historical game in virtual reality. You can experience enigmatic puzzles in the most wonderful attractions of Lower Silesia - a region in Poland that is rich in history and culture.

name: Psychic Investigation of Sakuragi Haru
description: 3D first-person horror game set in an abandoned middle school While running away from the attacking enemies, gather information about what happened at the school and solve the mystery.

name: Hentai Pool
description: Hentai Girls is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.

name: Spread: Transmission
description: Spread: Transmission is a turn-based strategy board game for up to eight players. Players take turns charging cells. Once a cell is fully charged it will spread and take over adjacent cells. Last player standing wins. There are multiple game modes called "Labs" that can be freely combined and customized. Players can play on one of the over 20 boards included with the game or design and play on their own boards.

name: Pokémon Eon Guardians
description: Pokémon Eon Guardians is a Pokémon fangame developed in RPG Maker XP using the Pokémon Essentials v19.1 starter kit and MKXP. The game was created with Gen 4 graphics and includes all Pokémon from the first four generations! Jump into an unknown adventure full of challenges, secrets to discover and a lot of fun! Explore the Terre Region in over 50 hours of gameplay, earn the region's eight badges, and face the Titanium Plateau!

name: Pokémon Daybreak
description: Pokémon Daybreak, a fangame made in Pokémon Essentials, introduces the enigmatic region 'Armira', and is centralized around storytelling and challenging gameplay. The game is aesthetically beautiful and there are many unique locations you will encounter on your journey, such as a meteor crash site, a castle and a cherry blossom forest. Themes of exploitation, greed, and history are examined and lore is dotted all throughout the game. Take on the challenge of becoming Pokémon Champion in the all-embracing region of Armira!

name: Space Pirates for Life
description: A 2D Sci-fi Action Platformer about a Space Pirate who has crash-landed on an unknown planet. Hack, slash and explore this bizarre and challenging retro-style world.

name: Ten Seconds Trillion
description: Ten Seconds Trillion is a unique clicker game with simple goals but addictive gameplay. Can you reach one trillion value just by clicking and buying upgrades?

name: Farm Day 2023
description: Looking for a fun and addictive farming simulation game? Look no further than Farm Day 2023! Develop your farming capabilities, grow crops, and build your own town. With beautiful graphics and a relaxed gameplay style, it's perfect for players of all ages. Start your farming adventure today!

name: Brain Memory: Premium Edition
description:
Help your child harness the hidden potential of their mind. Use these colorfull cards to improve their memory skills.
Brain Memory improves on the classic formula of memory games. It lets you increase the difficulty level at your own pace, and customize challenges to one's taste.

name: Pixel Paint: Premium Edition
description: Choose from a wide range of drawings, and expand your pixel art gallery!

name: Cat Tales: Premium Edition
description: Get on the dragon and fly on an adventure! Run around the flowery meadow with the little cute kitties. Travel on the back of big cats. Grab a magic umbrella and admire the meadows and fields from above. Discover more than 30 themes with fairy tale characters and animals. Play with colors and painting tools.

name: League of Enthusiastic Losers: Premium Edition
description: Just because others call you a loser, doesn't mean you are one. Make the journey to the 90s Moscow and experience an adventure about friendship and finding your true self.

name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia: Complete Edition
description: Explore the incredible world of nature with a charming little mouse. Beautiful, hand-painted graphics and an interesting collection of facts will awaken the naturalist's soul in everyone.

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Platinum Edition
description: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys Platinum Edition is a fun-centric party game which throws you (along with your friends) into a series of challenges and races throughout randomly generated tracks. Enjoy new decorations and get ready for loads of fun.

name: Space Tail: Every Journey Leads Home - Deluxe Edition
description:
Space Tail is a 2.5D adventure platformer, which immerses the player in a deep, emotional plot, and lets him explore new planets and interact with alien civilizations.

This game includes 2 new locations in the Homecoming DLC.

name: Fear or Evil: Nightmare Horror Scary Game Phobia 2023 Simulator Hunter Games
description: Fear or Evil is a first-person mystery game, mixed with different mechanics that will make you discover the scary story of the main character.

name: Sushi Time!: Premium Edition
description: Welcome to Sushi Time! Manage a sushi bar and become a tycoon of Japanese food! Try to deliver the orders on time, but be careful not to mix them up! Upgrade your bar and beautify it, so that you'll be able to create the best sushi in town!

name: Inquiry for Justice
description: The story of police officers who stand up against juvenile crime. And what about the protagonist, Justice's dark past?

name: Pwordle
description: pWordle is a fun and challenging word puzzle game inspired by the popular game Wordle and is available in multiple languages. With a virtual keyboard, Word of the Day, and Freeplay mode, a jukebox, gallery, players can unlock images and earn Steam achievements while improving their vocabulary.

name: Porndle
description: Porndle is a fun and sexy version of the word puzzle game inspired by the popular game Wordle and is available in multiple languages. With a virtual keyboard, Daily Word, Freeplay mode, jukebox and gallery, players can unlock beautiful images and earn achievements while improving their vocabulary.

name: Psycho Boys
description: Casual single or local co-op game (1-4 players). Throw bombs at enemies and try survive yourself or with your friend.

name: Paw Patrol: Grand Prix - Pup Treat Arena
description:
It’s party time at the Paw Patrol Grand Prix, and you and up to three pup pals are invited! Rev up for Pawsome fun as you compete to collect the most pup treats, before the time runs out. And use amazing Paw Patrol power-ups to gain pup treats and take the lead!
Use any skill, like Everest’s Snowballs, Tracker's Grabber Arm, and Ryder's Invincibility Shield, to outdo other players.

name: Really Happy Mouse
description: Sin descripción

description: Join Sherlock Purr on a purrfect adventure!

name: Pixel Family Fun: Ultimate Edition
description: Have fun and relax in Pixel Family Fun. Choose from a wide range of drawings and expand your pixel art gallery!

name: Cute and Creepy
description: A mix of horror and sweetness in the latest coloring book for Nintendo Switch.

name: Dr. Smart Space Adventure: In the Space
description: Set out on an epic adventure through the Solar System. A journey of a lifetime alongside Dr Smart, and his reliable Cosmic Encyclopedia.

name: Mato Anomalies: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The Mato Anomalies Digital Deluxe Edition includes:

Base Game
Pioneer's Badge
Treasure from Heaven (Mind Hack Card)
Early Spring (Mind Hack Card)
Witness of Truth
Special Weapon's Pack
Special Gears Pack
Soundtrack Jukebox
Digital Art Book

name: Hidden Harbor 3 Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Slingshot Battle
description: VR Multi-person physical combat games have distinctive weapons and roles. Weapons include explosive slingshot, frozen slingshot and water gun. There are four kinds of characters, chicken, ghost, mage and soldier. Each character plays differently.

name: Levis Umbra
description: Levis Umbra offers to bring back the Stealth genre to its roots. We offer an experience entirely based on sneaking and stealth dynamics.

name: Avoid It!
description: Every situation has a way out!

name: Living Legends Remastered: Wrath of the Beast - Collector's Edition
description: Can you take on Goldilocks' mantel and protect the kingdom?

name: The MisAdventures of Xenos
description: "Princess Fayne leads in "The MisAdventures of Xenos," a hilarious, turn-based RPG parody. Full of crude humor, meta jokes, and retro graphics, enjoy a fresh take on classic RPGs with new game+ mode. Discover a what-if quest line and defy genre conventions. Clear in 6 hours. Join the adventure now!"

name: Volar
description: Help Volar outrun their past as you jump, smash, and power your way through levels in this one-button platformer that is *not* an autorunner. Explore 5 unique worlds, using collectable masks to ignite, freeze, electrocute, and more. Each level presents a new challenging twist to test your skills!

name: Beyond the Wall
description: Classic point-and-click adventure with a magical atmosphere. Discover what happens one night Beyond the Wall of the garden. Immerse yourself into a mysterious world where fantasy meets reality with a pinch of humor. Solve puzzles, collect items, and overcome obstacles that await you on your journey.

name: Panzer Battles: Battles of Normandy
description:
The Battle of Normandy evokes so many emotions. It was the beginning of the 'Great Crusade' in Northern Europe by the Western Allies, yet was viewed as long overdue by the bloodied Soviets. Few realize that the casualties suffered in the three months of the summer of 1944 in Normandy rivaled the worst of the Eastern Front. The air and seaborne landings in Northern France were the largest the world has ever seen, with meticulous planning for D-Day, yet marked by a surfeit of clear goals once ashore. Both the bocage terrain and the dogged defense by the Germans resulted in the need for unexpected improvisation. Both sides had significant constraints; the British were nearing manpower exhaustion and would have to rely excessively on their armor arm, the United States had boundless resources but many of their divisions had never been in combat, while the Germans were short of everything and it was only through their ability to organize disparate troops into flexible kampfgruppen that they held the Allies for as long as they did. Ultimately, the Battle of Normandy resulted in the utter defeat of the Germans at Falaise with France and Belgium quickly liberated thereafter. The Allied advance would last till late September 1944, ending in the streets of Arnhem with Operation Market Garden. This second release in the Panzer Battles franchise is focused on many of the battles that occurred across the Calvados & Cotentin regions of Northern France. Fought across nearly three months from June 6th 1944 to August 20th 1944, actions from the D-Day landings, through the bocage fighting to the pursuit and destruction of the German forces at Falaise are included.

Battles of Normandy includes 93 Scenarios – covering all sizes and situations, including specialized versions for both head to head play and vs. the computer AI.

name: GA Geijutsuka Art Design Class: Slapstick Wonderland
description:
Inside an airplane heading for Japan, Mari is clutching a sketchbook which once belonged to her grandma, who is now deceased. The sketches on it are what her grandma had drawn before she died, reminiscing about the days spent in Japan. To color the sketches: a promise Mari made with her grandma. What will be Japan like, the country the grandma so much loved? Feeling hopes and fears, Mari drifts off to sleep.

The place she is heading toward as a short-term international student is GA (Geijutsuka Art Design Class). What kind of story will unfold, casting Mari and the members of GA?

name: Zoids 2: Herikku Kyouwakoku vs. Gairosu Teikoku
description: Zoids 2: Herikku Kyouwakoku vs Gairosu Teikoku is a Playstation simlulator game on 2002. It's a sequel to Zoids: Teikoku vs Kyouwakoku - Mecha Seita no Idenshi.

name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey: The Lost Tales of Greece
description: The Lost Tales of Greece is a downloadable content for Assassin's Creed: Odyssey. It consists of 12 episodes, providing new quests featuring new and familiar characters.

name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey: Prince of Persia
description: Prince of Persia is a downloadable content for Assassin's Creed Odyssey. It adds one new quest where the main character meets a blind Persian man.

name: Porkotyler's Captain Dodger
description: Using the musket of Captain Davy Jones, you’ll need to kill as many enemy pirates as possible in order to achieve a high score and earn your title as Pirate Lord of the Seven Seas. Be careful though. Your enemies will grow angrier the more you attack them. Be sure to drink more rum and get stronger.

name: Lokam Dating Sim
description:
In the dawn of time, there was only one thing to look forward to in life: romance. Where did I pull that fact from? Out of my ass, of course- but that isn't the point. The point is- love is pretty fuckin' cool, and has been around for the forevers.

Anyway, since Valentines Day never gets any romance games, why not have a dating sim for this particular day of celebrating said romances? Oh wait, the game wasn't released on Valentine's Day? This ruins everything.

name: Taiheiyou no Arashi: Senkan Yamato, Akatsuki ni Shutsugeki su!
description: Sin descripción

name: Just Dance 4: Special Edition
description: The worlds #1 dance game brand is back with Just Dance 4! The latest edition of the record-breaking franchise takes the party to a whole new level of fun, with over 40 all-new hits, the coolest dances and brand new features.

name: Just Dance 2
description: During development of Just Dance 2, a PlayStation 3 port was being made alongside it however was scrapped. Leftover graphics for this port still exist in the final game.

name: Just Dance: Greatest Hits
description: Just Dance: Greatest Hits is part of the Just Dance video game series published by Ubisoft. The game includes songs from Just Dance, Just Dance 2, Just Dance: Summer Party, and Just Dance 3, with 25 songs in the Wii PAL (Europe) counterpart (Best Of) and 35 songs in the NTSC (North America) Wii and Xbox 360 version (Greatest Hits). It is only available on the NTSC Wii and the Xbox 360.

name: Just Dance VR
description: Just Dance VR is a dancing game that contains 360° iconic universes. Just Dance VR is a place to have fun with your friends & all dancers from around the world thanks to private or public matchmaking.

name: Fly Me To The Stars
description: This is a difficult chocolate kaizo hack that requires in-depth understanding of the cape to complete.

name: Sonic Origins Plus
description:
Sonic Origins Plus is an updated version of Sonic Origins that includes the Plus Expansion Pack. Unlike Sonic Mania Plus, Sonic Origins Plus can be bought digitally on PC as a single purchase like the console versions, while the base game continues to be available on it's own. Digital versions of Sonic Origins on all platforms can be upgraded to Plus by purchasing the Plus Expansion Pack separately.

Experience the collected adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog in the newly remastered Sonic Origins Plus! With 16 legendary Sonic titles including 12 game gear games, new playable characters, modes, challenges, behind the scenes content, and more, this is the definitive way to play these classic games!

Sonic Origins Plus will be available as an all-in-one bundle in both digital and premium physical editions that include the Sonic Origins base game and the Plus Expansion Pack, featuring 12 Sonic Game Gear titles, playable Knuckles in Sonic CD, and for the first time ever, Amy Rose as a playable character in Sonic the Hedgehog 1, 2, Sonic 3 & Knuckles, and Sonic CD! This pack also includes previously released add-on content: Extreme Missions, Mirror Mode, new character animations, and additional backgrounds and music.

The premium physical release marks the first time any version of Sonic Origins was available on physical media. Released for Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and Switch, in addition to including the complete version of Sonic Origins Plus on a disc/cartridge it also comes packaged with a reversible cover with alternate box art, an art book and an outer sleeve.

name: Silent Hill DS
description: WayForward Technologies, developers of Silent Hill: Book of Memories, worked on a series installment for the Nintendo DS in 2006. They developed a one-room prototype demo using the lead character and assets from Silent Hill 2 before the game was cancelled.

name: The Idolmaster Tours
description:
THE iDOLM@STER TOURS is an upcoming arcade game that was first announced on February 10th, 2023, at Japan Amusement Expo 2023. It will be the first mainline arcade game since the original game. The graphics and models from Starlit Season have been carried over with some adjustments and additional models for the newly added characters.

The first location test began in the summer of 2023, and a second location test began in summer of 2024. The game is set to be released in Spring 2025.

name: Abduction!
description: Sin descripción

name: Megaton Musashi W: Wired
description:
Megaton Musashi W: Wired is set on Earth in the year 2118. The main characters pilot giant machines called “Musashi” to combat the Draktor, invaders from outer space that destroyed the planet in a matter of days.

This is the global version of Megaton Musashi X (Cross) with additional content.

name: Cubified
description: You are a sphere just living your life when an army of cubes comes in and tries to convert everyone to cubes. You have to fight your way through the cube forces and save the world from being cubified.

name: Pot Man
description: Pacman for stoners, get the joints to make cops into hamburgers and eat em!

name: 2 in 1: Donkey Kong 4 + The Jungle Book 2
description: A multi-cart featuring Donkey Kong Country 4 and The Jungle Book 2.

name: The Ultimate Sports Quiz
description: The Ultimate Sports Quiz is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Mere Mortals and published by Oxygen Interactive Software, which was released in Europe in 2005.

name: Deal & Wheeler
description: The world's most comprehensive car selling simulation game. Build your own huge empire on the vast and high-quality open world map. Buy a car and sell a car. Improve your circle and become a great businessman. Don't give up and follow your dreams.

name: Mary had a Little Lamb
description: Explore a small town and find your Lamb something to eat.

name: Traditional Story
description: Traditional Story is a turn-based Japanese RPG developed by Giraffe and Annika/Gitaroo Man designer Atsushi Saito when he was in junior high school. It follows a set of three adventurers and features Dragon Quest-inspired first-person battles.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's Franchise Bundle
description: The Franchise Bundle, also known as the Franchise Pack and Five Nights at Freddy's Bundle, is a compilation pack for multiple Five Nights at Freddy's games.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Sister Location
description:
This is the official mobile port of Five Nights at Freddy's: Sister Location!

Welcome to Circus Baby's Pizza World, where family fun and interactivity go beyond anything you've seen at those *other* pizza places! Now hiring: Late night technician. Must enjoy cramped spaces and be comfortable around active machinery. Not responsible for death or dismemberment.

Five Nights at Freddy's Sister Location is the fifth installment in the Five Nights at Freddy's series, featuring new characters, new places, and new terrors!

name: Operation Sea Wolf
description: Operation Sea Wolf is a total conversion for GZDoom/Doom II developed by Mike MacDee (Impie) in 2018 and released in full in 2019. It is an eight-map remake of Operation Arctic Wolf by Laz Rojas, and the third "Winter Agent Juno" mod, following Project Einherjar and Midgard Outlaw. Impie remade the Arctic Wolf maps from scratch, often combining several locations into a single, sprawling map.

name: Tornado Mania!
description:
Distressed by rampant pollution, a mad scientist unleashes his bizarre Tornado Machine on the world! Will the world praise or condemn him?

Use the tornado to engulf houses, buildings, and even power plants! Bring them to his Antarctic Biosphere to build a utopian society and carry out his mysterious experiment. Don’t feel like saving humanity? Then simply jump into Rampage Mode where you can destroy everything in your path!

name: Project: Pong
description: The Pong game is very simple, but what if there were two balls? What if there was fire in the middle? What if the whole field was frozen? What if there was a snake? A cannon? Ghosts? Bats? Wind? Water? Portals? This is the kind of ideas that inspired me in creating Project:Pong.

name: Bul Bakalım
description:
Bul Bakalım is a word puzzle game that lets you learn new words while playing. You have to swipe your finger over the letters on the board to form words in 1 minute. The longer the word, the more points you get.

You can play solo or with other players online. You can also create your own custom games with your own rules.

name: Dragon Mania
description: Meet the fiercest dragons. Raise them, breed them, and complete your collection to attract more visitors to your island. Train them in battles against friends! Fight alone or with the help of your friends' dragons to defeat evil Viking Kings in raids.

name: Use Your Mind
description: A simple Preist and Devil puzzle by Miniclip.

name: The Amazing Dare Dozen
description:
Enjoy the serene atmosphere of the forest and the chirping birds with The Amazing Dare-Dozen game! If you are looking for a way to get away from the stress of daily life, you might enjoy this quirky adventure. Can you believe that the main character is a carton of eggs? Even if it sounds silly, you'll find that excelling in this challenge requires plenty of patience and precision!

Your daring mission is to reach the top of the tree by launching eggs from one nest to the other. However, there's a catch! The nests are moving! Besides, a single mistake will cost you one of your precious eggs. As a result, you should move carefully, just like you're walking on eggshells!

name: 3 Foot Ninja
description: On your quest to find your destiny you'll face many obstacles and many enemies. Use the power of your sword wisely and swiftly, for your enemies are numerous and deadly.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Help Wanted
description:
This is the mobile version of Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted, a collection of classic and original mini-games set in the Five Nights universe.

Survive terrifying encounters with your favorite killer animatronics in a collection of new and classic Five Nights at Freddy’s experiences. “Where fantasy and fun come to life!”

Time to get your hands dirty. Repair claustrophobic ventilation systems, troubleshoot broken animatronics that could activate at any moment, or spend your evenings cowering in the nighttime security guard office.

Scenes from classic titles have been updated and remade for a fully immersive experience including Five Nights at Freddy’s, Five Nights at Freddy’s 2, Five Nights at Freddy’s 3, Five Nights at Freddy’s 4, and Five Nights at Freddy’s: Sister Location.

A minigame called Princess Quest was exclusive to the mobile port of the game. Occasionally, a grid pattern will appear on objects at the Prize Counter.

name: Monkey Lander
description: Collect all the bananas and help monkey land his spaceship on the platform. Play Monkey Lander game online on your mobile phone, tablet or computer.

name: Roxy's Windows
description:
What's going on with Roxy?

Sift and sort your way through Roxy's cluttered desktop to uncover the truth! Roxy's Windows is an interactive story based game where you're free to take things at your own pace; learn more about Roxy and her friends through the files on her computer, organizing them as you please.

Created as a part of Stepford's Mobile Game Jam on Newgrounds, this game can be played entirely with touch controls on your mobile device (or left clicking with the mouse if you're on a computer) If you spend enough time exploring, you might even be rewarded for your efforts!

name: GameMaster
description: Your goal is to explore the facility in order to obtain a keycode, which will allow you to escape! There are many strange and familiar faces that lay within this place, don't be shy.

name: It's Happening Again.
description:
Like furniture, your grief is sturdy and simple.

A text-based horror game about you. This game is best played with headphones and in fullscreen.

name: Halo 2: Project Cartographer
description: Project Cartographer is a modification for Halo 2 that restores online play and adds additional features that are not present in the base game.

name: While the Whole World Laughs
description:
She was alone in her room, drawing the night away. She could hear something faintly in the distance, it was music. She wondered where it was coming from.

Draw the world into view to help her navigate it.

name: Push the Button to Win!
description: you just have to push the button

name: Left at Home
description: Freckles is left at home sick as their partner, Beads, goes out to buy them medication.

name: RESYNC
description: After crash-landing on a structure orbiting a distant star, work alongside your robotic allies to solve puzzles and uncover the true purpose of the mysterious outpost.

name: Schwebebahn Simulator 2013
description: The player can either fulfill one of the missions offered, drive on individual sections of the route or drive on the route as desired without setting any goals. The track system was rebuilt with a length of 13.3 km. The city of Wuppertal is reproduced off the route, including some striking buildings; these include e.g. B. the Stadthalle Wuppertal or the main church Sonnborn .

name: WWF No Mercy
description: A cancelled Game Boy Color port of WWF No Mercy.

name: Mortal Kombat X
description: A cancelled port of Mortal Kombat X for PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.

name: Undead Arena VR
description:
The apocalypse has been, and gone.

Things are back to normal.

Survivors band together, we all live in fortified cities, and zombies are everywhere.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 4 - Season 2: Mega
description: Become Mega in Fortnite Battle Royale: Chapter 4 Season 2! Ride the grind rails of Mega City and swerve on it's streets on a sports bike. Go beyond the neon towers to the rest of the new biome: Cause havoc at Steamy Springs, drive a Nitro Drifter to the Drift Ridge car track, sharpen your Kinetic Blade skills at Kenjutsu Crossing and more!

name: G-Type
description: G-Type is a freeware shooter game created by CnC Darkside for Windows 9x. It is a fusion of R-Type and Gradius with a little Darius thrown in.

name: Space Gears
description: Space Gears is a next-generation Strategy set on Mars. Don't fret about micromanaging build orders, or your resources. Set your sights on victory by raising an army of mechs and build up your base in this fluid and fast-paced PvE and PvP strategy game.

name: DivineRPG
description: DivineRPG offers multiple Dimensions worth of content for you to explore. It also has many bosses for you to battle. Can you beat them all?

name: Billund
description: Billund is a new Minecraft mod by dan200, the creator of ComputerCraft, created in 48 hours for the Modjam mod making competition. It brings a fictional brand of toy plastic bricks to the game, that you might find familiar if you've ever played with LEGO.

name: CandyCraft
description: You want to have a journey to a peaceful and sweet country? Too bad! If you want Candyland to be peaceful, you will have to be strong and defeat all those dangerous creatures. Explore many biomes, tame pets and dragons, fight monsters and bosses, trade with the gingerbread villagers and travel through massive dungeons.

name: Transformers
description: a 3D beat em up starring the characters from the first generation of Transformers

name: Aotu World
description: Aotu World is a fast paced strategy RPG. Full of tactical battles, trendy & colorful outfits, mini games, and more!

name: Scavenger
description: While searching for an exit in an old cave mine, the scrapper Kiro meets a small, broken robot who asks for his help to get to the exit of the mine. During this adventure, however, he discovers far more than he could ever imagine.

name: The Origin of Hope
description: Turn-based team tactical games, you can freely match a variety of basic and advanced classes, explore rich gameplay routines, and pursue extreme gameplay such as one-turn clearance.

name: Totally Accurate Dating Simulator
description: You were stood up on your date! But you're already at the bar and won't leave without some female interaction!!! What awaits you? A simple stroll or a cult of hair enthusiasts? A pleasant conversation in a summer café or a detective investigation of a murder? Find out for yourself!

name: Traveler's Bastion: Spirit Guardians Expansion
description: Support the development of Traveler's Bastion and Unlock 4 New Travelers each with 3 special auto attacks.

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Chibi
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws: Pack - Variety Pack 6
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Samurai Revenge 2
description: Introducing the highly anticipated sequel, Samurai Revenge 2! Play as Kabuto, the famous samurai, defend your village and country from enemy forces. Old-school gameplay, RPG elements, and high-quality graphics make for an unforgettable experience. Download now!

name: Numina: Part 2
description: Step back into the world of Numina and prepare to unravel the gripping conclusion to the epic saga. Part II picks up right where Part I ended. With the world of Alterna on the brink of war, your bond with Shawn will be tested like never before.

name: Most Authentic Trench Warfare Simulator
description: "Most Authentic Trench Warfare Simulator" is a fun, lowpoly style, team based, PvP, 3rd person shooter game and a turn based tower defense game that is based on WW1 trench warfare background.

name: Mining Simulator
description: An Idle-Based mining game if you like simulators i got the thing for your week go down into multiple areas upgrade your pickaxe, rebirth and enjoy a totally actuate mining game also Mining Game go brrrrrrr

name: Math Parkour
description: "Math Parkour" is a puzzle parkour game.

name: Lust Girl
description: Lust Girls is a casual puzzle game. There are 12 beautiful girls with different characteristics in the game. Enjoy the time of jigsaw puzzle with them.

name: Industrial War
description: Explore the world In the 1920s, with more than 800 cities and 200 mines. Know your industrial chain and plan the role of each city; know your nation's unique polity structure and adjust your overall strategy. Resist the restlessness of your neighbors, acquire resources, and develop your industry.

name: First Responder VR
description: Be the hero in virtual reality! Respond to a range of emergency situations and save lives with your first aid skills. Immerse yourself in the heat of the moment and experience the rush of being a first responder. Get ready to make a difference! #VRFirstResponder #SaveLives

name: Final Gun
description: Experience the ultimate adrenaline-fueled rush with Final Gun - the fast-paced, multiplayer top-down shooter game where you engage in an epic arms race with other players as you fight for the title of the ultimate gun master.

name: Failure Drill
description: A 2D, singleplayer adventure game set in the near future. The player controls Claire on her journey as a soldier in a mysterious war, while also attempting to solve the enigmas her identity and reality hinged upon before. This game is a drama with psychological horror themes and stylized 2D art.

name: Bang Bang Land
description: Take part in a number of marksmanship challenges while you explore Bang Bang Land an abandoned theme park designed by a Gun Nut that had to be closed down due to serious Health & Safety concerns! Can you help it to reopen?

name: Burning Vengeance
description: Burning Vengeance is a indie old school 3rd person shooter. Fast paced grim gritty shoutouts with underworld scum and other lowlifes. Shoot and slaughter your way through guts and blood to get some glory...

name: Buddy Collection
description: A murder mystery otome game for PC.

name: Mountain Madness
description:
Now 100% free to play, no ads, no nothing. We hope it puts a smile on your face in these tough times – stay safe!
Stay ahead of the angry avalanche that’s in hot pursuit, avoid hitting trees, frozen lakes and other obstacles – unless you love the spectacular wipe-outs! Trip unwary penguins on the piste, skid across roads and over cliffs and hit those perfect lines to collect all the crates!

name: Littlebird/TrueEyes
description: A Nintendo Switch port.

name: My 9 Swallows: Topstars League
description: Collaboration between Otomate and Japan's professional baseball team Tokyo Yakult Swallows.

name: 9 R.I.P.
description: An otome visual novel about being spirited away.

name: Radiant Tale: Fanfare!
description: Fandisc for Radiant Tale.

name: Virche Evermore: EpiC:Lycoris
description: Fandisc for Shuuen no Virche -ErroR:salvation-.

name: Hakuouki Shinkai: Manyou no Shou
description: A fandisc that brings together a number of spin-off stories and illustrations into one, focusing on stories that were not included in the main story, such as recollections of incidents in "Hakuouki Zuisouroku".

name: My Shops
description: My Shops has you trying to manage an ever-increasing variety of shops located on a single avenue, instead of endlessly micromanaging a single store.

name: Hidden World 4 Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Safari Islands
description: Safari Islands is a game world where you explore two tribes and their habitat. You choose the tribe to which you belong, and you get to know other characters in your tribe. Some of them will send you on scavenger hunt-like quests, some will have puzzles for you to solve.

name: Steal It
description: Help the little redhead to steal all diamonds.

name: Xega Brain Trainer
description:
Xega Brain Trainer is a unique, fun, excellent and addictive game, developed to deliver the IQ Quiz Contest.
This unique quiz Game offers fun and exciting quiz questions that will keep you entertained and test your general knowledge with history, science, culture, sports, fun facts, word puzzles and many more.
The game is presented in an outstanding visuals and graphics as well as great sound effects for an immersive and an exciting experience.

name: Yolo Chase
description: Yolo Chase is the ultimate freeway police chase experience. Race your tricked out ride along a crowded freeway, dodging traffic and evading the popo. Can you be the greatest Yolo Chase hero of all time? Can you outrun the police the next time they try to pull you over? How far can you go? YOLO!

name: Word Trace
description: Word Trace is easy and relaxing word game where you slide letter blocks up and down in order to find the hidden word. There are 16 different categories of words to choose from. It starts very easy but gets more challenging in later levels.

name: Words & Magic
description:
Words & Magic is a RPG and fight with typing.
To find a better item while defeat the enemy, it is a hack-and-slash type game.
While promoting the game, you can practice typing with fun.
In addition, even in the case of those who are not familiar with the typing, it has been designed to be clear by growing the character and finding better item to equip.
It is also possible to using bluetooth keyboard.
There is no contents fee.
Application uses connection to the internet for ads, but you can also enjoy in offline.

name: Vikings vs. Dragons
description:
When the dragon blitzkrieg begins and and you’ve got nothing but a bundle of blood-soaked arrows and your half-frozen Viking brethren at your side… will you be ready?
Note: Vikings vs Dragons works best on iPhone 4S and above.
Defend the land of your ancestors in this Scandinavian epic. Combine your melee, magic, and garrison defense in a concerted, strategic effort to protect the legacy of your people.

name: Tiny Stack
description:
Build your stack of candies, marshmallows and other sweets without letting them fall off the screen! Featuring extremely cute characters in a colorful world, this 2.5D physics puzzle game and its addictive gameplay will provide you with tons of fun!
Explore 4 all different themed worlds, each with unique challenges and special events. Will you be able to protect your pile of sweets from weird candies and bubbles falling from the sky or hungry ghosts in a haunted mansion?

name: That Rhyme Game
description: So you're good in taking 4 pics and guessing the 1 word common between them. Now try a different challenge. With That Rhyme Game, you have 2 words to guess and 2 pics to get those words, with an added twist - both words have to rhyme!

name: Tennis Crackdown
description:
Test yourself and learn some more with this challenging game!
Tilt your device to move the star over the hidden tennis players picture to reveal who it is before the star freezes.
Earn coins for every 10 correct players, use these coins to unfreeze the star.
Guess incorrectly and lose a tennis ball, get 3 wrong and its game over!
This app offers in-app purchase where you can buy 250 coins to use to unfreeze the star.

name: Slider X
description: A four way block matching puzzle game for the Playdate

name: Savanna Race
description:
The best racing game on the savannah animals!
Savanna Race is a racing game with savannah animals.
Play with a zebra, a lion, a hippopotamus, a antelope, a elephant, a giraffe, a ostrich and a rhinoceros.
Avoid the obstacles on your way and pick up boosts to gain an advantage over your competitors.
Share your score on the Internet and try to stay in the world ranking.
If you agree, your location is detected automatically to display the flag of your country in the international scores table.

name: Space Conflict: Runner
description:
Fly as fast as you can! Avoid the planets!
Exciting space adventure where you will control a ... spaceship!
In this game you need to fly between planets and collect stars. Dangers are awaiting you at every step so you will need a lightning reaction.
Try to beat your friends and get first place in Leaderboard.
3..2..1.. Well, you think you're pretty agile? Let's start!

name: Smashtastic Cricket
description:
Awesome fast paced arcade style cricket gameplay combined with a deep RPG career mode. Play your innings in fully simulated T20 games and tournaments to help your team win by scoring big runs!
Batting is fun and intuitive with easy to learn swipe controls! The super addictive gameplay is easy to pick up but hard to master!

name: Soccer World Cap
description:
Take your team to glory !!! Think fast, aim, shoot, and the ball is at the bottom !!!!
Test your skill and aim by taking your favorite country or team and make it a legend.
Every time you win you will accumulate rewards to improve the skills of your team; In addition, you have the opportunity to have fun playing against a friend on the same device.
Choose between National Teams and clubs from all over the world, or fantasy teams, play on different courts and prove that you can be the champion.

name: Space Cord
description:
Space Cord challenges you into crazy contest!
Explore the space and collect all trophies through its energy platforms avoiding dangerous traps on your way! Try to hold on as long as possible in a space race!

name: Spanker
description:
The new time-attack clicker is here!
Slap the Rainbow Unicorn as many times as you can!
Unlock characters and get the highest scores in two leaderboards.
Have a nice slapping.
Watch out, the Uni is addicting!

name: Spot the Difference Blitz
description:
There are 15 beautiful hand-drawn levels for you - play in single-player or with a friend.
Try to get the best score of all Game Center players of "Spot the Difference Blitz"!
There are 3 modes of our game: demo-mode, single player & two players.
Play together and get more fun!

name: Stick Figure Movie Trivia
description:
The Very Best Movie Trivia Game you've ever seen.
PlayScreen presents ... Stick Figure Movie Trivia, . If you Like Movies, you’ll love Stick Figure Movie Trivia! Identify the movie from a stick figure drawing of a famous scene.

name: Tap the Ball DX
description:
Tap The Ball DX have one simple goal - tap the ball. Use your finger tap on the ball as fast as you can. One finger of two fingers. Ready to challenge? Download an play now.
+ Unlock all the balls if you can. Basket Ball ,Soccer,Volleyball, Football, Tennis, Baseball, Golf, Pingpong, etc

name: Super Breakout 13
description: Super Breakout is an exciting arcade game where you control a spaceship and bounce a ball to destroy all the alien obstacles and save the world. You must use your quick reflexes and strategic thinking to navigate through space tubes, break down walls, and clear all the obstacles in your path. With each level, the challenges become increasingly difficult, but you can collect power-ups along the way to help you. Can you master the game and save the world from the alien invasion? Play Super Breakout now to find out!

name: SudoQi
description: SudoQi is a fun and challenging Sudoku puzzle game that will test your logic and puzzle-solving skills. With Sudoku puzzles of all levels of difficulty, from beginner to expert, there is something for everyone.

name: Spell Blitz
description:
A magical mix of Bejewled Blitz and Ruzzle!
A fast paced magical word finding game. Explore playing with different charms and spells to make your way to the top of the weekly tournament leaderboard.
Find words quickly on an ever evolving board. Combines Bejeweled Blitz with the word play of Boggle or Ruzzle. Customize your strategy with special powers to boost your style of play.

name: PBR: Raging Bulls
description:
Hop on up and hang on tight for the ride of a lifetime!
Take your place amongst PBR greats by showing the world you can tangle with the toughest bulls around. Start your career on the amateur circuit. Win prizes and deck yourself out with even better gear. Sharpen your skills, learn to ride like a pro and work your way all the way to the bright lights of Las Vegas for the PBR World Finals. The official mobile game of the Professional Bull Riders is full of the high-jumping, hard-kicking action you crave. Think you're ready? Let's ride!

name: One Thousand Pinball Dots
description: Hi there! Do you like Pinball? What about Brick Breaker? Well, we have mixed these two classic games together so prepare for an endless fun!

name: Omega Go
description: Think you can get from A to Z? Challenge yourself with Omega Go, the newest game from Tiny Apps! Merge letters together to form higher letters; the higher the letter, the more points you earn!

name: My Baseball League
description:
Using a simple button press to bat and pitch your way through 50 opponents; your team will have to overcome the challenges of players eating too much before a match, staying up too late the night before, and getting distracted by their mobile phones.
Forget the glory of the World Series – this is baseball at its most simple!

name: Mosquito Alive
description: Mosquito Alive. Maintain alive the mosquito avoid enemies collision. Collect gifts around the game and go to the end...

name: Pandoras Books
description: Taking word games to a new level, this brain teasing game will challenge your mind and your senses. Use your skills and help Pandora defend cities of classic books by unscrambling words and defeating monsters.

name: Ping Pong Run
description: From the animation studio Tenggrenska comes a simple and addictive ping pong game. For how long time can you keep the run going? Enjoy the stunning design and animations when you play!

name: Pine Grove
description:
Pine grove, nobody comes in there because missing cases.
John is a phychic detective. He reads evidences and go back to the crime scene through his power. He tried to find the culprit and his missing brother 'Patrick'. He has only 'missing people list' & some evidence.
Now, you become 'John' and solve the case! and collecting the evidences!

name: Production Chain Tycoon
description: Welcome to Production Chain Tycoon, the idle simulation game that puts you in the role of a CEO managing your industrial empire. In this game, you must use strategy and careful management skills to optimize your supply chain, increase production efficiency, and become the ultimate tycoon.

name: RubPix
description: Rubpix is a picture-forming sliding block puzzle game from the creator of Pretentious Game.

name: Rolly Hills
description:
Ready, Set, roll!
Play as numerous adorable characters.
